## Source: amazon-inspector (c036555d918021fafe661296499aab549fac428c2b9cefb72670f63914dfa974)
The package icon-service was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (4f7301fe52d8afbc08b8694f47c110b415a32cb3fa5775dc536544ea42f1661a)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'icon-service' @ 5.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
